grateful.title: Thank you for using Stelios!
grateful.description_1: If you've enjoyed using my design system and appreciate it's features, I would be incredibly grateful if you could show your support by starring the
grateful.description_3: A tremendous amount of thought, effort, and time has gone into crafting a responsive, accessible, and versatile system and one star would be a great way to show your appreciation.

button.title: Button
button.description: A button initiates an action when clicked.

variants.label: Variants
variants.description: Button comes in multiple variants: contained, outlined, soft, outlined-soft & neumorph.

sizes.label: Sizes
sizes.description: Button comes in multiple sizes: small, medium & large.

icons.label: Icons
icons.description: Button can have icons: leading, trailing or both.

rounded.label: Rounded
rounded.description: Button can be rounded or not.

disabled.label: Disabled
disabled.description: Button can be disabled or not.

fullWidth.label: Full Width
fullWidth.description: Button can be full width or not.

rounded.name: rounded
rounded.description: Is the button rounded or not?

disabled.name: disabled
disabled.description: Is the button disabled or not?

isFullWidth.name: isFullWidth
isFullWidth.description: Is the button full width or not?

color.name: color
color.description: The color of the button created using the color palette

leadingIcon.name: leadingIcon
leadingIcon.description: The leading icon of the button

trailingIcon.name: trailingIcon
trailingIcon.description: The trailing icon of the button

onClick.name: onClick
onClick.description: The function to be called when the button is clicked

iconButton.title: Icon Button
iconButton.description: IconButton is a button component that can be used to trigger an event or action.

variants.label: Variants
variants.description: IconButton comes in multiple variants: contained, outlined, soft, outlined-soft & neumorph.

sizes.label: Sizes
sizes.description: IconButton comes in multiple sizes: small, medium & large.

disabled.label: Disabled
disabled.description: IconButton can be disabled or not.

disabled.name: disabled
disabled.description: Is the IconButton disabled or not?

color.name: color
color.description: The color of the IconButton created using the color palette

alt.name: alt
alt.description: The alt text of the icon

onClick.name: onClick
onClick.description: The function to be called when the IconButton is clicked
